landing.presentationSmallTitle: Organize store sales by phone and PC
landing.opportunitiesText2: Enter any number of products and manage the warehouse
landing.opportunitiesText3: View and download various reports on sales and products in stock
landing.opportunitiesText4: Scan the barcode of products with your phone when entering and selling products in the warehouse
landing.opportunitiesText5: The sale can be made in cash and non-cash
landing.opportunitiesText6: Send payment requests to buyers, accept card payments from anywhere in the world. Accept QR code payments in partner apps
landing.benefitsText1: The application is available for IOS and Android phones as well as computers (WEB) without additional devices.
landing.benefitsText2: Automatically register users and attendants, view their sales
landing.benefitsText3: Simple and convenient online registration in the app or on the website
landing.benefitsText4: Already integrated with e-cash register. Application of e-cash register solves a number of business problems and is innovative.
landing.benefitsText5: There are no investment costs, no need for additional devices. There are no ``hidden'' tariffs and fees
landing.benefitsText6: Send the E-Cash receipt to your customer
landing.priceListStars1: *  will not be charged in case of E-cash register
landing.priceListStars2: ** does not include servicing bank commissions
landing.priceListRow3: Maximum number of sellers (users) and outlets
landing.priceListRow5: Range and quantity of registered goods
landing.priceListRow7: REceipt providing via SMS message (for each)
landing.priceListRow8: Sending Link payment requests via SMS message

units.refresh: Program not responding, please reload the page

intro.intro: StoreX is an online trading system designed for easy and understandable cash and non-cash sales. Download the StoreX app to manage your sales from your phone.

authorize.resetInfo: You’ll receive a link to reset your password.
authorize.login_issue: Enter your username and password to log in
authorize.success: Please check your Email and Phone Incoming messages. To complete the registration, follow the link sent to the email address.
authorize.confirmation: Enter the activation code from the SMS received on your phone number
authorize.confirmation2: Thank you. You will receive a message with a new activation code shortly.
authorize.blockremove: Unable to login .User has been blocked by administrator

errors.bank_agreement: In order to accept payments by QR or by SMS it's required to make a PayX service agreement with a bank. Tariffs are defined by banks according to the card payment service agreement․
errors.loginLimit419: Dear user, your StoreX's trial ended and access will be stopped. For activation please contactPayX.
errors.loginLimitAttention: The free trial of the system is available for 7 days
errors.cashlimit: From July 1, 2022, private companies, individual entrepreneurs must carry out their transactions exceeding AMD 300,000 only cashless
errors.discount: Please check the Discount field, it cannot be empty
errors.discount2: The Discount field cannot be more than 99%
errors.soldOut: There are sold out or insufficient quantities of products in the basket finished product

mainnavigation.searchconcl: The product with the specified barcode or name is not listed or is out of stock.
mainnavigation.multipleProductText1: Download the excel form, fill in the appropriate fields (information about the product, service).
mainnavigation.multipleProductText2: Upload the finished excel file with filled data
mainnavigation.measureCorrectForm: Attention «Measure» field has a clear format
mainnavigation.vatCorrectForm: If there are products not subject to VAT in the product list, mark «yes» in the column, otherwise, leave it empty.
